body: This story was way more convoluted than it needed to be.
this shit got more ups and downs as an rollercoaster. but the story is rly good. and good for the son and his mom that all the side storys about her where just dreams or imaginations. 9/10

Here are some pages for summary about this entire series storyline(for reader who lazy to view entire series)

Pg 219-237(these pages briefly explain how MC having SEX with his mom two months ago, this is the flashback btw)

Pg 259-274(these pages explain on how MC gets the hypnotize drugs and how he used it on his mom, also flashback btw)

Pg 486-488(these few pages explore the truth behind of MC's mother. She actually know his son having sex with her in that night when she came back from class reunion. And in order to help his son get back to correct lifestyle, she then done all sort of Sex things with his own son with the SECRET PLAN)

Pg 494-498(Ten years later, MC marry with his love one, Rin and they have one daughter and here's come the end with MC still continue the secrect relationship with his mom😂)
